snippet: Local tourism officials on the Philippine island of Tawi-Tawi are promoting the area’s sandy beaches, but violence and kidnappings pose a significant problem.
lead_paragraph: Local tourism officials on the Philippine island of Tawi-Tawi are promoting the area’s sandy beaches, but violence and kidnappings pose a significant problem.

headline.seo: Promoting Tourism on Beautiful but Violent Tawi-Tawi
headline.main: Volatile Philippine Region Courts Tourists, Cautiously
headline.print_headline: Volatile Philippine Region Courts Tourists, Cautiously
